name: IOUserAudioDevice
desc: An audio clock device object that handles the configurations for running I/O.

items.name: + Create
items.desc: Allocates and initializes an instance of the audio device class.

items.name: - init
items.desc: Initializes an instance of the audio device class.

items.name: - free
items.desc: Frees the audio device.

items.name: - GetClassID
items.desc: Gets the audio class identifier of the object.

items.name: - GetBaseClassID
items.desc: Gets the audio class identifier of the base class object.

items.name: - StartIO
items.desc: Tells the device to start I/O.

items.name: - StopIO
items.desc: Tells the device to stop I/O.

items.name: - PerformDeviceConfigurationChange
items.desc: Tells the device to handle a configuration change.

items.name: - AbortDeviceConfigurationChange
items.desc: Tells the device to stop handling a configuration change.

items.name: - HandleChangeSampleRate
items.desc: Tells the device the sample rate is changing.

items.name: - DeviceSampleRateChanged
items.desc: Updates stream formats, in response to the owning audio device changing its sample rate.

items.name: - AddStream
items.desc: Adds an audio stream to the device.

items.name: - RemoveStream
items.desc: Removes an audio stream from the device.

items.name: - SetCanBeDefaultInputDevice
items.desc: Sets a Boolean value that indicates if this device can be the host’s default input device.

items.name: - CanBeDefaultInputDevice
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates if this device can be the host’s default input device.

items.name: - SetCanBeDefaultOutputDevice
items.desc: Sets a Boolean value that indicates if this device can be the host’s default output device.

items.name: - CanBeDefaultOutputDevice
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates if this device can be the host’s default output device.

items.name: - SetCanBeDefaultSystemOutputDevice
items.desc: Sets a Boolean value that indicates if this device can be the system’s default output device.

items.name: - CanBeDefaultSystemOutputDevice
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates if this device can be the system’s default output device.

items.name: - SetInputSafetyOffset
items.desc: Specifies the input safety offset of the device.

items.name: - GetInputSafetyOffset
items.desc: Returns the input safety offset of the device.

items.name: - SetOutputSafetyOffset
items.desc: Specifies the output safety offset of the device.

items.name: - GetOutputSafetyOffset
items.desc: Returns the output safety offset of the device.

items.name: - SetPreferredChannelsForStereo
items.desc: Sets the channel indices for the prefered stereo pair.

items.name: - GetPreferredChannelsForStereo
items.desc: Returns the channel indices for the prefered stereo pair.

items.name: - SetPreferredInputChannelLayout
items.desc: Sets the input channel layout, using an array of audio channel label values.

items.name: - SetPreferredOutputChannelLayout
items.desc: Sets the output channel layout, using an array of audio channel label values.
